sqlQuery.name: AllVariableValues
sqlQuery.sql: select av.string_value as value, av.attribute_stable_id as variable_id, s.stable_id as study_id, EntityTypeTerm.source_id as entity_type_id from eda.AttributeValue av, eda.EntityType et, eda.Study s, sres.OntologyTerm EntityTypeTerm, eda.AttributeGraph ag where av.entity_type_id = et.entity_type_id and et.study_id = s.study_id and et.type_id = EntityTypeTerm.ontology_term_id and ag.stable_id = av.attribute_stable_id and ag.study_id = et.study_id and av.number_value is null and av.date_value is null and av.string_value not in ('Yes', 'No') and (ag.hidden is null or (ag.hidden != '["everywhere"]' and ag.hidden != '["variableTree"]'))

sqlQuery.name: All
sqlQuery.sql: select --+ NO_PARALLEL av.string_value as value, av.attribute_stable_id as variable_id, s.stable_id as study_id, EntityTypeTerm.source_id as entity_type_id, ag.display_name as variable_name, EntityTypeTerm.name as entity_type_name, dsp.display_name as study_name, sd.dataset_id from eda.AttributeValue av, eda.EntityType et, eda.Study s, sres.OntologyTerm EntityTypeTerm, eda.AttributeGraph ag, apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter dsp, apidbTuning.StudyIdDatasetId sd where av.entity_type_id = et.entity_type_id and et.study_id = s.study_id and et.type_id = EntityTypeTerm.ontology_term_id and ag.stable_id = av.attribute_stable_id and ag.study_id = et.study_id and av.number_value is null and av.date_value is null and av.string_value not in ('Yes', 'No') and (ag.hidden is null or (ag.hidden != '["everywhere"]' and ag.hidden != '["variableTree"]')) and s.stable_id = sd.study_stable_id and sd.dataset_id = dsp.dataset_presenter_id
